name: Traffic Is Hell
description:
A (very preliminary) prototype for a spiritual successor to The Darkness II. Currently just features the dual wielding and grabbing/throwing object mechanics.

Story: Hell is a dreadful and boring place. After getting stuck in one last fateful traffic jam, this demon has finally had enough, and decides to go postal.

Created in Unreal Engine 4.26.1 with the theme "Jam".

Controls:

WASD: Movement

Mouse: Camera

Q: Pickup/Throw Object

Z: Drop Object

Left Mouse Button: Shoot Left Weapon

Right Mouse Button: Shoot Right Weapon

E: Swap Hand for Weapon Switching (don't think this is working)

Scroll Wheel: Switch Weapon in Selected Hand (also don't think this works atm)

Credits:

Daniel Gil: Music & Audio

Devin Johnson: Programming, Game Design, & 3D Art

Raj Uprety: 2D Art & Concept Art

Jonah Venglarcik: Programming, Level Design, & Technical Art

Special thanks to Leo Ratner and Jessica Coan for their shader insights! Several 3D assets from Kenney.
